alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 7:59PM CST until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... South Fork of the Forked Deer near Halls For the South Fork Forked Deer River...including Jackson, Halls... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork of the Forked Deer near Halls. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Tuesday was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 9.1 feet. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
